paragraphs.heading: Homeless Health Needs Audit 2015
paragraphs.content:
Throughout 2015 Graih and the Vulnerable Adult Health Visitor carried out the island's first-ever [Homeless Health Needs Audit](/img/case-for-improving-the-health-of-the-homeless-in-the-iom.docx). The results, compiled in partnership with Community Health, provide the first data on health and homelessness in the Isle of Man.

The audit identifies clear areas for action and is an invaluable resource for statutory and third sector groups.
